title: EcoPure EPINL40 Deluxe In-Line Refrigerator Water and Icemaker Filter - Universal, Fits All Major Brand Refrigerators - High Capacity - Built to Last , White
features: Long lasting in-line refrigerator filter that fits most brands including: Samsung, LG, Whirlpool, Kenmore, Frigidaire, GE and many more
Easy to install - comes with 1/4" push-connect fittings
Robust design eliminates sediment, cysts, and chlorine taste and odor
Six-month filter life: Filter should be replaced every six months for best filtration results
description: The EcoPure EPINL40 Deluxe in-line refrigerator filter is a no-brainer when it comes to a longer-lasting, reliable in-line filter. This universal filter easily connects with most major brands of refrigerators and icemakers, saving you money, hassle and time spent worrying about the water in your home, RV or boat.  Easy to install as it comes with 1/4"" push-connect fittings easy setup. Designed to fit major brands of refrigerators and icemakers. Protects your refrigerator, drinking water, and ice maker from sediment and chlorine taste and odor.  Designed, engineered and assembled in the USA. Bpa-free. Text ECOPURE to 444999 to sign up for filter change reminders.  Questions? Call the EcoPure helpline at (800) 693-1138.
In-Line Refrigerator Filter. Simple to install 1/4" push to connect fittings. Removes chlorine taste and odor, cysts and lead.
